title: Miles City Steam Laundry
text:
The Miles City Steam Laundry is a historic building in <a href="Miles%20City%2C%20Montana">Miles City, Montana</a>. It was added to the <a href="National%20Register%20of%20Historic%20Places">National Register of Historic Places</a> on July 5, 1979. It was owned by Cyrus Hugg Mott. The building was demolished in 2011.
It was built in 1908 as a one-story building; a second floor was added c.1910-12; one-story additions were added later. It was a -plan building.
